institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal Human Resources Development Support Project Operation Rules/Article 24 (Learning Infrastructure Support)
contents: Article 24 (Support for learning infrastructure) ① The chairman may support infrastructure such as equipment (equipment) necessary to build a learning culture in supporting companies that have conducted excellent learning activities. ② Supported companies are selected from among new and continuing companies with excellent performance evaluations, and the selection criteria and scope of infrastructure support are separately determined by the chairman. ③ Supported equipment is a learning activity for a total of 3 years, including the year of support. If the business is discontinued or the business operation is deemed inappropriate as a result of monitoring, the remaining value excluding depreciation costs can be recovered in cash.
